gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 111, Heat 92
gameRecap.excerpt: Dallas defeats Miami, 111-92. For Dallas, Luka Doncic led the way with 29 points, nine rebounds, and nine assists while Kyrie Irving finished with 25 points (five 3PM), four assists, and two steals in the victory. Tyler Herro recorded 21 points, seven rebounds, and six assists while aided by Kevin Love (16 points, 11 rebounds) for Miami in the losing effort. Dallas improves to 50-30, while Miami moves to 44-36 in the loss.
